title: Great app, super fun!
text: I love this app! I was using it and it is super easy and fun to use. It took me literally 2 minutes to sign up and get my profile ready. It showed me how to scroll and like and all these other things to get me started! It is such a good app and I love how everyone can share ideas. One question though; why can't people without a lot of followers get discovered as much? They might take like, 2 hours making a video and doing their best quality and posting it with tags and all that, yet they still only may get 5 likes and it would take a long time to get more followers and be discovered. Lots of people who are popular on tiktok have it easy because they post a new video and so many people follow them that it instantly goes viral and all those other good videos made by people who haven't had a lot of followers yet get drowned out. That annoys me, but I won't complain too much. It could take years to get popular or could take months. Overall, this is a great app and I love it! The user interface is super clean and easy to access/use. Will keep this for a long time!

title: Annoying UI and Constant format Issues
text:
So iâ€™ve had tiktok since it became a thing. Iâ€™m a lurker, but my saved videos are really important because i am an artist and i regularly download videos or use the Favorite option if i canâ€™t download the video. This is the first issue. I have around 7000 favorites posts, which sounds insane but the reality is i probably only have 2000 actual posts while the rest are DELETED POSTS THAT I HAVE TO MANUALLY REMOVE. Do you guys realize how much of a pain that is? 

The second issue is the following limit and following accounts in general. There is no filter like on instagram or anything where you can find the least integrated with or the oldest followed accounts. again, YOU HAVE TO MANUALLY REMOVE ANY ACCOUNTS YOU NO LONGER WANT TO FOLLOW. Even deleted or removed accounts are still stuck there! itâ€™s so annoying! 

Please for the love of god take the initiative and just create filters for the following lists, and make the favorites listings like for videos, sounds, etc easier to deal with. I donâ€™t want to take an hour or two out of my day to just clear everything out when the tiktok developer team could fix it and make everyoneâ€™s lives easier. I just want the unavailable videos in my favorites gone, and i want a filter for the following lists. Please. Itâ€™s so frustrating.

title: Tiktok was great! But...
text: I've used tiktok for a couple of years now but recently it feels like my algorithm keeps pushing videos that I don't want to see :/ My fyp was exactly how I wanted it about a month ago since I like videos about games I enjoy, artists and jokes I like, etc. but recently it feels like every few videos on my for you page there's something I'm not interested in at all with millions of likes. Despite clicking "not interested" on these videos that keep appearing out of nowhere, the tiktok fyp keeps flooding me with popular videos that have nothing to do with my interests like hair tips and dancing videos. There's nothing wrong with videos like these being on tiktok but it's frustrating to see them show up over and over when I've never liked any videos that would push this content onto my fyp so much. It's gotten to the point where I've actually just closed out the app after a few minutes and went onto other video sharing apps just so I can see more content like I actually want to see. I'm not sure what caused such an abrupt change in the tiktok algorithm, but I'd rather see videos pertaining to my interests similar to ones I've liked even if they aren't popular as opposed to popular videos that I don't really care about :(

title: Not safe for marginalized communities

title: Fun but frustrating
text: I absolutely love tiktok. It is so addicting and if youâ€™re following users that post the content you like, it is probably the most entertaining app out there. I also love making my own videos and actually receiving recognition for them, unlike any other platform where only the people that follow you can see your content. As much as I love this app, there are also frustrating aspects of it. If you ever have a problem on tiktok and send them questions regarding it, donâ€™t expect a response. Tiktok is terrible with responding to issues. My account has recently been blocked from posting for a week because I broke community guidelines, which is fine and I understand that, however - when I got it back after a week, I posted three videos in one day, none of which were a threat to the community guidelines whatsoever, and that same day I got blocked again! I have tried reaching out to them through the apps â€œreport and issue â€œ section, email, and even Instagram! They have never gotten back to me and my account remains blocked. I take my account seriously as well as I have a good amount of followings. Tiktok, please resolve this issue of removing videos that arenâ€™t inappropriate or blocking accounts that are innocent.

title: America needs Tiktok
text: The USA badly needed laws around data sharing long before TikTok came along, but since TikTok weâ€™ve had the first time Americans have actually talked in our entire history. Now, of all times, we need TikTok. My country faces civil unrest that wonâ€™t be solved without meaningful discourse. The way TikTok encourages people to have discussions about nuanced subjects on everything from personal growth to national politics with their own voices is revolutionary to our way of understanding ourselves and each other. Sure it comes with the pitfalls of social media - but I didnâ€™t see Congress give half this energy to Facebook post-Cambridge Analytica. TikTok has personally changed my life, connected me with community like Iâ€™ve never had before, and given me more focused purpose, and incidentally taken my business to the next level.   Iâ€™ve had discussions and reached understandings with people of opposing political views like I never thought possible. Not only should you download this app, US citizens should write their representatives about why you should be allowed to continue to do so.

title: Disappointing
text: So first I would like to say I really do love the app for many reasons, but there are also many reasons why it is becoming my least favorite app now. One reason being, is that when anyone reports a video, even for no reason at all where it is not breaking community guidelines, the app does not allow it to be visible on your profile and is â€œunder reviewâ€. One of mine was supposedly reported even though it did not break any community guidelines (and I read the full rules in fine print for the app) and it has been hidden from my profile to everyone for months. This happens on lives as well, if someone reports it the app automatically makes the live stop, even if it did not break any community guidelines. If someone wants to report a video, the video should be visible until deemed otherwise if it is in fact breaking any rules, then it should be deleted. Many users work hard for their content and they shouldnâ€™t be punished for the small percentage of people who report any random content for whatever pleasure it brings them if it doesnâ€™t break any guidelines. The app should also notify the user if their video was reported and is under review with factual evidence on why it is under review so the user can learn from it for next time, or if it is a mistake, can be resolved. And that is why I am rating it 1 star as of this time.

title: Too many issues with my account
text: This app is a great way to find funny/cool content. I would give TikTok 5 stars if I wouldnâ€™t have had as many issues with my account. I have had my account taken down without any videos violating the community guidelines. Just like that, no warning, just my account with thousands of followers gone. I appealed this decision and got it back about a week later. I read over the entire community guidelines and made absolutely sure none of my videos violated them. Recently, Iâ€™ve had my account taken down for the second time without any reason why whatsoever. There was not any video I posted that ever violated the community guidelines yet my account is gone for the second time and Iâ€™ll have to appeal it again. Other creators have had the same issue, theyâ€™ll sign into the app and see their account is removed and they donâ€™t know why. TikTok is great in terms of finding the videos you want to see. But Iâ€™m terms of creating videos I donâ€™t know if I recommend it given that Iâ€™ve put a lot of effort into my own videos just to have my whole account vanish for no reasonâ€¦twice.

title: TikTok Support Never Replies
text: I spent over a year gaining around 27k followers before I was banned without any reasoning. I opened up my app one day and I had a white message on my screen saying that I was permanently banned for â€œmultiple guideline violations.â€ I was never made aware that I violated any guidelines whatsoever. I submitted an appeal to being banned and still havenâ€™t received anything back on whether my appeal was approved or denied. I sent 2 separate emails and still nothing. This isnâ€™t the first time Iâ€™ve tried to contact their support. Iâ€™ve tried 10 times on my original account in the â€œreport a problemâ€ section and I never got any help. Itâ€™s funny how they ban any accounts that people report without actually looking into it. My account was centered around being part of the lgbtq+ community. So of course, thereâ€™s going to people who report my account because they donâ€™t agree with my content. Yet theyâ€™ll keep up accounts that go against their â€œhate speech guidelines.â€ They had to even make it so that creators couldnâ€™t message underage children and the same underage kids canâ€™t receive comments. Just so people like James Charles and Tony Lopez canâ€™t contact CHILDREN. Both creators are still allowed to have a platform on TikTok and make money off it. Itâ€™s sick. They wonâ€™t ban the people that are actually harmful.

title: Needs a few changes but is overall and app I love

This seems good at first that you donâ€™t have to click the following or fyp buttons to get there, however if you have had the app for a while you know that it used to be whatever page youâ€™re or (fyp or following) you used to just swipe right to see the persons account and other videos. title: Laggy and Unfair
text: My TikTok doesnâ€™t receive the latest versions of the app until a long while later and itâ€™s not fair when people are being reported for no reason. Accounts are now using captions to warn people that itâ€™s fake so they donâ€™t get reported. I donâ€™t feel that should be necessary. And going live should be an option to everyone. Itâ€™s not fair when you have to have 1,000 followers because even people without 1,000 could still have fans that want them to go live. And whatâ€™s with the whole Verification thing? I donâ€™t get why we need that. There shouldnâ€™t be a status rank on the app. This app is for people older than 12 and I donâ€™t think itâ€™s fair that the people who bend that rule have any right to report things because they are too young for that. The producer of the game should make an app similar to TikTok where itâ€™s safe for younger kids to be on. Only kid friendly sounds and such. This way no one on TikTok will be reported for no reason. It could be called TikTok Junior or something. It could have all the same features but only kid friendly sounds and content. Sorry if you donâ€™t agree, but those who are younger and are reporting for no reason are ruining others enjoyment. One of my videos was reported and I donâ€™t cuss, or have any gore on my page. If a video is reported, it should actually be reviewed and looked at by a real person.
